error_msg: Please show the following code when contacting support
name: name
scan: Scan the QR code with the IRMA app
account_explanation: On your account page you can alter your data, update your settings and see an overview of the hubs
sep_hub_explanation: Every hub has its own settings page and rules. If you want to view the settings of a specific hub, log in to that hub
answer_ph: A network of separate hubs for social connections and information, see
answer_irma: An app for logging in, in a privacy friendly way, see
